text: Pros: The girl who was working there was really nice. The atmosphere is cool.  Cons: I watched her water down my drink. 4 dollars a piece for watered down tea in very small plastic cups with no lids.  tea was ok.  Its just not worth it
Great quiet place to study and work, open late and delicious healthy food. I tried the salad and iced tea.
Super! Le propriétaire est super sympa, et la terrasse dehors est vraiment agréable, hamac inclus! Je retourne sans hésiter!
